decision_conditions: Within 3 months of the dates of this planning decision, full details of refuse and recycling storage shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved details shall be implemented in full and retained thereafter.Reason: To avoid harm to the character and appearance of the streetscene and local area in accordance with policy 28 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018 and to ensure adequate provision of refuse and recycling facilities in the interests of amenity for future and neighbouring occupiers in accordance with policy 29 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.

Within three months of the dates of this permission, documentary evidence including 'as-built' Standard Assessment Procedure (SAP10) outputs must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the proposed measures set out in the approved Energy Strategy Statement Report (Rev01) prepared by Briary Energy Ltd and dated 21 June 2024 have been implemented on site and that each of the dwellings has achieved the targeted reduction in CO2 emissions. All of the approved measures must thereafter be retained for as long as the development is in existence. Reason: To comply with Policy 31 of the Sutton Local Plan 2014
description: Application to clear condition 2 (Refuse and recycling store) and 4 (Energy) of approved application DM2024/00225.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
